page.title: 08CRAMOND :Private Prep School
page.content: When I first looked at Cargilfield I thought it was unattractive.Once I got inside,I realised how lovely it was. They have a sweet little chapel and a cool swimming pool. There are lots of sports such as cricket, athletics, hockey, rugby and golf. The school is beautifully furnished and the dorms are quite tidy. The Headmaster has been there for seven years. his room has a lovely big sofa. If the children want a book, they can get one from the library. There are many computers in the school for the children to use. They can also learn French,Latin and Greek. The teachers are very friendly and helpful.There are 117 children at the school and usually only 12 children in a class. The children are nice but some of them really miss their parents. Altogether it is a lovely school. I felt very welcome.{
